start.text:
Hello. I am about to introduce you to the work of Rob Cantor's "Shia LaBeouf Live."
Please let your mind see this as if from your own eyes.
You can quit at any time by typing QUIT in the terminal.
start.prompt:
Your instructions are to type the all caps word to make your choices, but you can type them in lower case.
For example, Type ONE to go to Verse 1:

quit.text:
You have chosen to quit
Please confirm

one.text:
You're walking in the woods
There's no one around and your phone is dead
Out of the corner of your eye you spot him
Shia LaBeouf

two.text:
He's following you, about 30 feet back
He gets down on all fours and breaks into a sprint
He's gaining on you
Shia LaBeouf
two.prompt: Run for your CAR or find HELP:

help.text: The last thing you see is the bloody face of Shia LaBeouf
help.prompt: Go back to verse ONE or QUIT:

car.text:
You're looking for you car but you're all turned around
He's almost upon you now
And you can see there's blood on his face
My God, there's blood everywhere!

fight.text: You are overpowered by Shia LaBeouf
fight.prompt: Go back to verse ONE or QUIT:

run.text:
Running for you life (from Shia LaBeouf)
He's brandishing a knife (it's Shia LaBeouf)

cut.text:
Lurking in the shadows
Hollywood superstar Shia LaBeouf
Living in the woods (Shia LaBeouf)
Killing for sport (Shia LaBeouf)
cut.prompt: You can't help but to LOOK:

look.text:
Eating all the bodies
Actual cannibal Shia LaBeouf

do.text: Now it's dark, and you seem to have lost him

lost.text:
But you're hopelessly lost yourself
Stranded with a murderer
lost.prompt: Do you want to SNEAK or HIDE:

hide.text: Found! by Actual Cannibal Shia LaBeouf!
hide.prompt: Go back to verse ONE or QUIT:

sneak.text:
You creep silently through the underbrush
Aha! In the distance

see.text:
A small cottage with a light on
Hope! You move stealthily toward it

safe.text: But your leg! Ah! It's caught in a bear trap!
safe.prompt: UNDO the trap or GIVE it your leg:

give.text:
Gnawing off your leg (quiet, quiet)
Limping to the cottage (quiet, quiet)
Now you're on the doorstep

undo.text: You can't open it, the trap is too strong.
undo.prompt: It does not work! You can't GIVE up!

in.text:
Sitting inside
Shia LaBeouf
Sharpening an axe (Shia LaBeouf)

quiet.text:
But he doesn't hear you enter (Shia LaBeouf)
You're sneaking up behind him

chance.text:
Strangling superstar
Shia LaBeouf
Fighting for your life with Shia LaBeouf

strong.text: Wrestling a knife from Shia LaBeouf
strong.prompt: THROW the knife or STAB Shia:

stab.text:
Stab him in his kidney
Safe at last from Shia LaBeouf
stab.prompt: You can look for a PHONE or LEAVE:

leave.text:
You limp into the dark woods
Blood oozing from your stump leg
You've beaten Shia LaBeouf
leave.prompt: You hear the sounds of the NIGHT in the woods:

night.text:
Wait! He isn't dead (Shia surprise)
There's a gun to your head and death in his eyes

surprise.text:
But you can do jiu-jitsu
Body slam superstar Shia LaBeouf
Legendary fight with Shia LaBeouf
surprise.prompt: MORE jiu-jitsu or grab the AXE:

axe.text:
Normal Tuesday night for Shia LaBeouf
You try to swing an axe at Shia LaBeouf
But blood is draining fast from your stump leg

chopping.text:
He's dodging every swipe, he parries to the left
You counter to the right, you catch him in the neck
chopping.prompt: The fight is OUT of control:

flee.text: You're too weak, better keep CHOPPING

out.text:
You're chopping his head now
You have just decapitated Shia LaBeouf

blood.text:
His head topples to the floor, expressionless
You fall to your knees and catch your breath
You're finally safe from Shia LaBeouf
